item.title: Rose add a quote by Albert Einstein
item.description: "Blind belief in authority is the greatest enemy of truth." -- Albert Einstein

item.title: Rose add a quote by Albert Einstein
item.description: "If we knew what it was we were doing, it would not be called research, would it?" -- Albert Einstein

item.title: Rose add a quote by Albert Einstein
item.description: "We are all life trying to live, among other life trying to live." -- Albert Einstein

item.title: Rose add a quote by Margaret Atwood
item.description: "I read for pleasure and that is the moment I learn the most." -- Margaret Atwood

item.title: Rose add a quote by Albert Einstein
item.description: "Everybody is a genius. But if you judge a fish by its ability to climb a tree, it will live its whole life believing that it is stupid." -- Albert Einstein

item.title: Rose add a quote by Mark Twain
item.description: "If you tell the truth, you don't have to remember anything." -- Mark Twain

item.title: Rose add a quote by Albert Einstein
item.description: "Never memorize something that you can look up." -- Albert Einstein

item.title: Rose add a quote by Ralph Waldo Emerson
item.description: "Finish each day and be done with it. You have done what you could. Some blunders and absurdities no doubt crept in; forget them as soon as you can. Tomorrow is a new day. You shall begin it serenely and with too high a spirit to be encumbered with your old nonsense." -- Ralph Waldo Emerson

item.title: Rose add a quote by Abigail Van Buren
item.description: "The best index to a person's character is how he treats people who can't do him any good, and how he treats people who can't fight back." -- Abigail Van Buren

item.title: Rose add a quote by Albert Einstein
item.description: "Somebody who only reads newspapers and at best books of contemporary authors looks to me like an extremely near-sighted person who scorns eyeglasses. He is completely dependent on the prejudices and fashions of his times, since he never gets to see or hear anything else." -- Albert Einstein
